text.text_translated:
Two men looked north across the land.  
The land stretched as far as the eye could see.  
You could only just see the fences.  
The teenage boy felt bored.  
He did not want to follow rules.  
He could not run away on foot.  
Sam saw the biggest horse kicking the ground with its big feet.  
The boy wondered if he could ride the horse.  
A good rider could get into a lot of trouble here.  
Someone who knew nothing about horses could get even more trouble.  
The boy wanted to leave his father.
